class SysDnsClient

Detailed Description

DnsClient provides functions to retrieve DNS information synchronously and asynchronously.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DnsClient::DnsClient (  const DataConnProfilePtr &  dc_prof = DataConnProfilePtr()  ) 
 

Creates an instance of DnsClient that can be used for asynchronous requests.

DnsClient::~DnsClient (   )  [virtual]
 

Destroys this object and the referred SysDnsClient object.

Member Function Documentation

UINT16 DnsClient::GetHostByAddr (  const IpAddr &  ip_addr,
String &  name,
const DataConnProfile *  dc_prof = 0
)  [static]
 

Resolves the host address synchronously, i.e. this method is blocking. It returns EDNSC_OK on success or an error code.

BOOLEAN DnsClient::GetHostByAddrAsync (  const IpAddr &  ip_addr  ) 
 

Resolves the host address asynchronously. Derive method OnNameResponse() to react to the asynchronous response.

See also:
OnNameResponse()

UINT16 DnsClient::GetHostByName (  const String &  name,
IpAddr &  ip_addr,
const DataConnProfile *  dc_prof = 0
)  [static]
 

Resolves the host name synchronously, i.e. this method is blocking. It returns EDNSC_OK on success or an error code.

BOOLEAN DnsClient::GetHostByNameAsync (  const String &  name  ) 
 

Resolves the host name asynchronously. Derive method OnAddrResponse() to react to the asynchronous response.

See also:
OnAddrResponse()

static void DnsClient::Init (   )  [inline, static]
 

Initializes the DNS client. Has to be invoked when data connection profile settings are changed.

virtual void DnsClient::OnAddrResponse (  const IpAddr &  ip_addr,
UINT16  error_no
)  [inline, protected, virtual]
 

Implement this method to handle the response of an asynchronous name resolution (address request).

See also:
GetHostByNameAsync()

Reimplemented in DnsClientTest.

virtual void DnsClient::OnNameResponse (  const String &  name,
UINT16  error_no
)  [inline, protected, virtual]
 

Implement this method to handle the response of an asynchronous address resolution (name request).

See also:
GetHostByAddrAsync

Reimplemented in DnsClientTest.

static void DnsClient::Shutdown (   )  [inline, static]
 

Releases the held default data connection if it was needed for DNS requests.
